name: Chef
body:
### Brian Adams - Chef Recipes and other interesting things.

## Little bit about me:
Linux Administrator I at Rackspace with aspirations of getting into the wonderful world of devops! Always have a project to be working on and always trying to improve methodology for developing scripts. Really dig DevOPs teams with a desire to grow, collaborate, and teach to those who are passionate about learning what it takes and paying it forward.  

###Recipes I've built: 

```
lsync
tf2server
newrelic 
``````

### Designer Templates


### Authors and Contributors

### Support or Contact
Send a message! My email is b@contrasting.org.
